title: sadAshivam upAsmahE
sahitya:
sadAshivam upAsmahE shammudA cidAnanda rUpam sadA mudA


anupallavi

 nidAgha dattAtrEya kapila vAma dEva vyAsa shukAdi vandita 
padAmbhOja yugaLam varAbhaya pradAna kushalam bhakta vatsalam


caraNam   carAcarAtmaka prapanca gEham surAsura sEvita vSabha vAham 
murAri prabhrti dEva samUham parAshakti sammELana mOham 
purANa puruSam purAntakam shankarAbharaNa bhAsamAna dEham 
nirAmayam nikhila shOkApaham parAtparam parama guruguham aham
